content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this cheery holiday bird with a christmas-striped hat is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70703ad corrections applied nov 29 2012 skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 5 colors 1 ball each *shown in black white mustard brick olive* *ed note only small amounts of contrast colors used* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing worked in continuous rounds scarf is worked in row hat is worked separately then sewn onto head some construction required to finish
